6.117. sibl_gui.components.core.database.migrations.versions.002_add_table_Sets_Column_previewImage¶

002_add_table_Sets_Column_previewImage.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the 002 version Application Database migrations objects: upgrade() and downgrade() definitions.
